subtitleNullable: A Comprehensive Dataset for Evaluating Fake News with PolitiFact Annotations
descriptionNullable: The Politifact corpus is a curated collection of English-language news samples from PolitiFact.com, designed for controlled and effective fake news analysis and model development. Notably, each text is individually labeled for veracity by experts, ensuring reliability. The dataset comprises complete texts aligned with specific claims, offering nuanced context. Additionally, it includes metadata such as text type (e.g., social media, news, blog), enriching the analysis. With its expert labeling, textual completeness, and informative metadata, the Politifact corpus stands out as a valuable resource for studying and combating misinformation.
title: Politifact Fake News Dataset
subtitle: A Comprehensive Dataset for Evaluating Fake News with PolitiFact Annotations
description: The Politifact corpus is a curated collection of English-language news samples from PolitiFact.com, designed for controlled and effective fake news analysis and model development. Notably, each text is individually labeled for veracity by experts, ensuring reliability. The dataset comprises complete texts aligned with specific claims, offering nuanced context. Additionally, it includes metadata such as text type (e.g., social media, news, blog), enriching the analysis. With its expert labeling, textual completeness, and informative metadata, the Politifact corpus stands out as a valuable resource for studying and combating misinformation.
